about_the_game:
Important:

• If you already have the T28 Concept in your Garage, you will receive 2,500 gold as compensation.
• If you already have the Independence camouflage, you will receive 950 gold as compensation.

This bundle includes:

• T28 Concept Collector vehicle (U.S.A., tank destroyer, Tier VII)
• Garage slot
• 9 equipment slots
• Independence Legendary camouflage for the T28 Concept
• American Eagle attachment
• 10 Rare Combat XP boosters
• 10 Rare Free XP boosters

The T28 Concept is an easy-going Collector tank destroyer boasting a solid hull and decent damage. The comfortable gun traverse limit ensures both a wide strike area while stationary and the ability to quickly hit a target when driving out from cover. Jump into battle and crush everyone in your path!

This DLC bundle can only be added to your World of Tanks Blitz account once.
